dct_title_s: Imperium Japonicum in sexaginta et octo provincias divisum
dct_description_sm: qua fieri licuit fide & cura descriptum a Joh. Casparo Schevchzer.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margin.
Decarative cartouche with Japanese Gods, compass rose, rosaries.
Statistical table: Numerantur in Imperio Japonico.
Distance table: Japonici Imperii à varijs Terrarum Orbis partibus distantiæ juxta Japones & eorum milliaribus.
From: The History of Japan ... by Engelbertus Kempfer ... translated ... by J.G. Scheuchzer. London, 1727.
2 inset maps: Kamtschatka ... ; Niphon, S. Japaniae Insulae ...
From Kaempfer's The history of Japan, London, 1727.
